Packages 
Package Description
com.madrobot.app  
com.madrobot.beans
Implements the missing java.beans classes in android
com.madrobot.db
Utilities for extracting and inserting with the embedded SQLite database.
com.madrobot.db.orm
Database operations automation utilities.
com.madrobot.di
Data interchange formats(JSON,CSV,XML,plist) Parsing and processing utilities
com.madrobot.di.csv
Comma Separated Value (CSV) processing utilities.
com.madrobot.di.json
JSON serializer/deserializer
com.madrobot.di.json.annotations
Annotations for the JSON serializer/deserializer
com.madrobot.di.plist
Utilities to handle iPhone's Property List(.plist) format.
com.madrobot.di.xml
Everything you will ever need with XML Serialization
com.madrobot.di.xml.annotations
Annotations for the XML serialization component
com.madrobot.di.xml.converters
Converters for non primitive types.
com.madrobot.di.xml.deserializer.simple
A simple and less refined XML deserializer.
com.madrobot.di.xml.deserializer.simple.annotations
Annotations for the simple XML deserializer.
com.madrobot.di.xml.io
Highly flexible I/O wrappers that can be used for any text based or binary protocols.
com.madrobot.di.xml.io.path
Library for tracking paths of nodes in documents using a subset of XPath.
com.madrobot.geom
Geometric primitive utilities.
com.madrobot.google
Utilities to help work with the API's that Google exposes
com.madrobot.graphics
Extensions to the already awesome 2D graphics primitives on Android
com.madrobot.graphics.bitmap
Over 200 Bitmap filters and Convolutions to help with any Bitmap manipulation task.
com.madrobot.graphics.svg
Fast and efficient implementation for the missing Scalable Vector Graphics (SVG) support in android.
com.madrobot.graphics.threeD
3D graphics utilities, .OBJ,.MTL file loaders
com.madrobot.hardware
Device hardware(Sensors,Accessories) querying and reporting utilities.
com.madrobot.hardware.location
Utilities that simplify Location management using the most efficient onboard providers.
com.madrobot.hardware.sensors
Sensor information quering and data extraction utilities
com.madrobot.io
I/O Utilities to assist with the most complex of I/O tasks with simple yet powerful error handling and management
com.madrobot.io.file
File,file system, file system based caches and utilities
com.madrobot.io.file.filters
Efficient file and directory filtering routines
com.madrobot.io.file.monitor
File monitoring tools
com.madrobot.lang
Utilities that help perform really low level operations on primitives and Thread management
com.madrobot.lang.reflect
Object utilities as well as classes that help with reflection operations on classes, methods, fields and enums.
com.madrobot.log
Logging framework that allows logging to DDMS, simple log files and HTML files.
com.madrobot.math
Math functions that are not natively available
com.madrobot.media
Utilities that help you make media(images/video) related queries.
com.madrobot.net
Utilities for any network related operation.
com.madrobot.net.client
Implementations for common network clients like TCP, UDP, Time, Finger and Socket
com.madrobot.net.client.async
Highly responsive and simple Asynchronous Http client implementation.
com.madrobot.net.client.mail
SMTP, POP3 email clients that support almost every SMTP and POP command
com.madrobot.net.client.oauth
OAuth client library.
com.madrobot.net.client.oauth.signature
OAuth Signers
com.madrobot.net.client.upload
File upload client that supports notifications for spolling, progress and resumability.
com.madrobot.net.client.websocket
WebSocket client implementation
com.madrobot.net.client.xmlrpc
XML-RPC client with robust implementations for serialization and method calling.
com.madrobot.net.server
Minimalistic implementation for an HTTP server and more to come.
com.madrobot.net.util.cache
This package contains a cache module that can be used for HTTP/1.1 client-side caching.
com.madrobot.net.util.cache.annotation
Annotations for the HTTP cache implementation
com.madrobot.pim
Utilities that make Personal Information Management simplified.
com.madrobot.security
Cryptography, Base encoding, Check sum and other security related utilities
com.madrobot.taskpool
A versatile Task Pool Implementation
com.madrobot.tasks
Collection of commonly used Async tasks
com.madrobot.text
Text/Date/Time manipulation, extraction and validation utilities.
com.madrobot.ui
Routines that solve common UI related anomalies.
com.madrobot.ui.adapters
Custom adapter implementations
com.madrobot.ui.anim
Fluid like animations that are easy to use and customize
com.madrobot.ui.drawables
Code based UI drawables
com.madrobot.ui.widgets
A whole lotta Custom UI Widgets.
com.madrobot.util
Useful common utilities along with a Mersenne Twister Random implementation
com.madrobot.util.collections
Set of java collection implementations like FastStack, FastHashmap, ExpiringMap, Pool etc.
com.madrobot.util.zip
Utilities for operations on zip based file formats.
